# AVVideoCompositionLayerInstruction.Configuration

**Structure**

Configurable properties for initializing a new AVVideoCompositionLayerInstruction instance.

## Declaration

```swift
struct Configuration
```

## Creating a configuration

- **init(assetTrack:)**: Creates a new video composition layer instruction for the given track.
- **init(trackID:)**: Creates a new video composition layer instruction for the given track ID.

## Configuring the crop rectangle

- **setCropRectangle(_:at:)**: Sets the crop rectangle value at a time within the time range of the instruction.
- **addCropRectangleRamp(_:)**: Sets a crop rectangle ramp to apply during the specified time range.
- **cropRectangleRamp(at:)**: Obtains the crop rectangle ramp that includes the specified time.

## Configuring the opacity

- **setOpacity(_:at:)**: Sets the opacity value at a specific time within the time range of the instruction.
- **addOpacityRamp(_:)**: Sets an opacity ramp to apply during a specified time range.
- **opacityRamp(at:)**: Obtains the opacity ramp that includes a specified time.

## Configuring the transform

- **setTransform(_:at:)**: Sets the transform value at a time within the time range of the instruction.
- **addTransformRamp(_:)**: Sets a transform ramp to apply during a given time range.
- **transformRamp(at:)**: Obtains the transform ramp that includes a specified time.

## Inspecting the configuration

- **trackID**: The track identifier of the source track to which the compositor will apply the instruction.

## Creating a layer instruction

- **init(configuration:)**: Initialize an AVVideoCompositionLayerInstruction with a configuration.

## Conforms To

- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
